short_description.content: The CMS simulation and collsion data for 2016 and beyond are available on the CERN Open Data Portal in the nanoAOD format, derived from miniAOD, which is a subset of Analysis Object Data (AOD). This page provides tutorials on how to access and analyse CMS data in NanoAOD format for 2016.

title: Getting Started with CMS NanoAOD Open Data 2016 and beyond
